description: Sent if a service is restarted
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceRestart FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAddress s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceType s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceName s EXAMPLE

description: Unique service MIB table index.
Remark: If the managed system addresses services via an integer type,
serviceId and serviceAddres have the same value
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId

description: Service address. If the managed system addresses services via an integer type,
serviceId and serviceAddres have the same value
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAddress

description: Service type
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceType

description: Optional sevice label
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceName

description: Sent if the contents of the variable serviceEvent is changed
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceEventChange FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAddress s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceType s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceName s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceEvent s EXAMPLE

description: Unique service MIB table index.
Remark: If the managed system addresses services via an integer type,
serviceId and serviceAddres have the same value
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId

description: Service address. If the managed system addresses services via an integer type,
serviceId and serviceAddres have the same value
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAddress

description: Service type
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceType

description: Optional sevice label
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceName

description: Service-specific information about the last relevant event (e.g.: call rejected, switch to redundant instance).
Remark: neither each alarm writes to this variable nor the contents are restricted to alarms.
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceEvent

description: Events sent if any alarm in the 'serviceAlarmTable' changes it's value to 'noAlarm'
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmNoAlarm FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmContext s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmReason s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmClass i 1 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmId i 9999

description: Textual description of the alarm
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmContext

description: Optional reason for the last alarm state change
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmReason

description: Unique service MIB table index.
Remark: If the managed system addresses services via an integer type,
serviceId and serviceAddres have the same value
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId

description: Denotes the class of the alarm.
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmClass

description: The ID of the alarm within the alarm class
variables.name: FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmId

description: Events sent if any alarm in the 'serviceAlarmTable' changes it's value to 'warning'
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmWarning FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmContext s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmReason s EXAMPLE FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceId i 9999 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmClass i 1 FREQUENTIS-GENERIC-SERVICEINFO-MIB::serviceAlarmId i 9999
